errata.name: Archaon
errata.errata: The last two quest corners have swapped around.

errata.name: Aspiring Deathbringer
errata.errata: Third Quest Objective is now Khorne Unit. Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Beheading Strike
errata.errata: Now only requires 2 Units to be removed, but damage has been lowered to 5.

errata.name: Blood for the Blood God
errata.errata: Healing has been reduced to 4, from 5.

errata.name: Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne
errata.errata: Both Unit Objectives have been replaced with Khorne Unit Objectives. Cost has been reduced to 1, from 2.

errata.name: Bloodreaver Chieftain
errata.errata: Both Unit Objectives have been replaced with Khorne Unit Objectives. Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Curseling
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Exalted Death Bringer
errata.errata: Second Quest Objective is now Damage. Third Quest Objective is now Khorne Unit.

errata.name: Gaunt Summoner
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Herald of Nurgle
errata.errata: Quest updated to include Nurgle Unit Objectives. Health modifier reduced to 1, from 2.

errata.name: Horticulous Slimux
errata.errata: Last Quest Objective is now a Nurgle Unit.

errata.name: Iridescent Horror
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Kairos Fateweaver
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 8, from 9.

errata.name: Lord of Change
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Ogroid Thaumaturge
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 4, from 5.

errata.name: Putrid Blightlord
errata.errata: Third Quest Objective is now a Nurgle Unit. Healing from the passive effect has been increased to 2, from 1. Health modifier has been reduced to -1, from 0.

errata.name: Rotbringers Sorcerer
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to -1, from -2.

errata.name: Skarr Bloodwrath
errata.errata: Both Unit Objectives are now Khorne Unit Objectives. Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Slaughterpriest
errata.errata: Last quest corner is now Ability, instead of Remove. Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0. Third Quest Objective is now a Khorne Unit.

errata.name: Spell Hunting Flesh Hound
errata.errata: Now also deals damage.

errata.name: The Changeling
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Unrivalled Battle-Lust
errata.errata: The second corner is now a 2, instead of a 3.

errata.name: Valkia the Bloody
errata.errata: The Heroic Act now only affects Khorne Units.

errata.name: Vortemis the All-Seeing
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 2, from 0.

errata.name: Alarielle the Everqueen
errata.errata: The last two Quest Objectives are now Unit and Damage, instead of Ability and Unit.

errata.name: Aspect of the Sea
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 10, from 11.

errata.name: Aventis, Magister of Hammerhal
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 9, from 10.

errata.name: Averon Stormsire
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Celestant-Prime
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 10, from 12.

errata.name: Deathly Descent
errata.errata: Now deals damage equal to the number of disengaged enemy Champions before it Removes.

errata.name: Devotee of Khaine
errata.errata: First corner has been removed.

errata.name: Evocator-Prime
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 4, from 5.

errata.name: Isharann Soulscryer
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -2.

errata.name: Isharann Tidecaster
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Knight-Incantor
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from -1.

errata.name: Lord-Relictor
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Lord-Veritant
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Morathi, High Oracle
errata.errata: The second Quest Objective is now an Ability.

errata.name: Mutilating Witch
errata.errata: Corners are now o/2/2 (instead of X/o/2/3).

errata.name: Prison of the Gods
errata.errata: Now has a minimum heal amount of 4.

errata.name: Spiteful Branchwych
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Towering Treelord Ancient
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 9, from 10.

errata.name: Zealous Witch Hag
errata.errata: Quest Objectives two and four have swapped places. Cost has been reduced to 4, from 5. Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Abhorrant Ghoul King
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Arkhan, Mortarch of Sacrament
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to -1, from -2.

errata.name: Bloodseeker Sanguinarch
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 8, from 9. Health modifier has been increased to 2, from 1.

errata.name: Bloody Vampire Queen
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from -1.

errata.name: Coven Throne
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 8, from 10.

errata.name: Death Unabated
errata.errata: Only the first two corners now restrict actions. Corners three and four now draw 1 and 2 cards instead.

errata.name: Feasting Vargheist
errata.errata: First corner is now an X.

errata.name: Guardian of Souls
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to -1, from -2.

errata.name: Hungering Vampire Lord
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from -1.

errata.name: Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Macabre Ghoul King
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 8, from 9.

errata.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 13, from 15. Health modifier has been increased to 2, from 1.

errata.name: Neferata, Mortarch of Blood
errata.errata: The Vampire Unit can now be deployed onto herself or an adjacent Champion. The removal field has gone down to a cone in front of her.

errata.name: Reikenor the Grimhailer
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 2, from 1.

errata.name: Skulking Necromancer
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 5, from 6.

errata.name: The Briar Queen
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Twisted Necromancer
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to -1, from -2.

errata.name: Vampire Lord of Nightmare
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 3, from 5.

errata.name: Aleguzzler Gargant
errata.errata: Now removes one highlighted Unit, instead of all.

errata.name: Ancient Dankhold Troggboss
errata.errata: The highlight now only affects Units diagonally across. Cost has been increased to 12, from 11. Health modifier has been reduced to 0, from 1.

errata.name: Bonesplitter Shaman
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Cruisin’ for a Bruisin’
errata.errata: Damage has been reduced to 10, from 12. Highlight is now 3-wide, instead of board wide.

errata.name: Flame-Belching Firebelly
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 9, from 10. Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Foul Butcher
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Grot Shaman Spider Rider
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Hallucinating Shroomancer
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Hypnotic Boggleye
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 1, from 2.

errata.name: Kunnin’ Grot Shaman
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Mosh Pit
errata.errata: Base damage has been reduced to 2, from 3.

errata.name: Rallying Cry
errata.errata: Can no longer deploy onto Wizards and now only either on the acting Champion or adjacent Champions (as opposed to any Champion).

errata.name: Repulsive Butcher
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 5, from 6.

errata.name: Skragrott, the Loonking
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Smash and Bash
errata.errata: Highlight is now 3-wide, instead of board wide.

errata.name: Snazzgar Stinkmullet
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 0, from -1.

errata.name: Sneaky Grot Shaman
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 2, from 3.

errata.name: Squig Lure
errata.errata: Now has three corners instead of four.

errata.name: Weirdnob Shaman
errata.errata: Cost has been reduced to 5, from 6.

errata.name: Zarbag the Shaman
errata.errata: Health modifier has been increased to 1, from 0.

errata.name: Choking Vines
errata.errata: Now only prevents rotations on the first two corners. Third corner is an X, and fourth corner deals 8 damage.

errata.name: Gaze of Vulcatrix
errata.errata: Damage has been increased to 6, from 4.

effect.en: [Heroic Act]: Look at your Opponent's hand and shuffle 3 of their cards into their deck. This Heroic act can only be used once per game.

[Heroic Act]: You may [Deploy] 1 *Seraphon* Unit from your discard pile onto a highlighted Champion (normal restrictions apply), Your Opponent shuffles X cards from their hand into their deck. [Rotate] this 1 step forwards.
When a highlighted Wizard [Deploys] a Spell, deal X damage to your Opponent, your Opponent shuffles 1 card from their hans into their deck, and [Rotate] this 1 step forwards.

As this enters play, [Discard] 1 card from your hand.
X damage to your Opponent. Increase this by 2 if they have 5 or fewer cards in their hand.

Your Opponent shuffles X cards from their hand into their deck.
Search your deck for up to X *Seraphon* Units and move them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

3 damage to your Opponent.
If your Opponent has 5 or fewer cards in their hand, you [Draw] 1 card.
At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or less health, [Draw] 1 card and gain 2 health.
